subject: Soccer
Extradition
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Danny Jordaan, the chief organizer of South Africa’s 2010 World Cup events, and Molefi Oliphant, a former president of the South African Football Association, were named in a criminal complaint.
snippet: Danny Jordaan, the chief organizer of South Africa’s 2010 World Cup events, and Molefi Oliphant, a former president of the South African Football Association, were named in a criminal complaint.
